text:
@realDonaldTrump HAR!  You will hire your own pollster to cook the numbers just like FL is currently massively under-reporting COVID-19 deaths by calling them pneumonia.  

Numbers don't lie. The media should pick this up!
#FailedPresident 
#TrumpHasNoPlan 
#ResignNowTrump 
#ResignNowBarr
